caption.p: Univariate sensitivity analyses of predictive models for ( A) precipitation, ( B) evapotranspiration, ( C) clay content, ( D) soil organic carbon, and ( E) lithology. MT, metamorphic rocks; PA, acid plutonic rocks; PI, intermediate plutonic rocks; PY, pyroclastics; SC, carbonate sedimentary rocks; SM, mixed sedimentary rocks; SS, siliciclastic sedimentary rocks; SU, unconsolidated sediments; VA, acid volcanic rocks; VB, basic volcanic rocks; VI, intermediate volcanic rocks. Zones 1 â€“ 3 correspond to those defined in Fig. S5.
